name: Little einsteins Z Burasutā! !
description:
Join the battle as Leo and others in this very first Little Einsteins fan game ever made!

What are the modes?:

Arcade mode-Try to beat the highest score

Battle mode- Its a 2 player versus mode! See who can win the fight!

Time attack- How fast you can complete the entire game?

Survival mode- See how many fighters you can defeat!

tutorial mode- Omochao can show you how to play the game!

High scores - See the high score in each game mode!

Characters:

Leo

annie

Sonic

Shadow

Kirby

Klonoa

Mecha sonic (Unplayable as a final boss character)

Stages:

rocket's house

Canyons

Green hill zone

burned city

Dream land1

Dream land2

Dark space (Unplayable as a final boss stage)

Subscribe to GTFoxN6Y:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRQy9t-dNjL-K02CGZspOLQ
